lines.text: We're sisters. We're a lot more alike than you think.
I never said an open party, my parents will slaughter me.
Well it's a small price to pay when you consider what it'll do for your social life.
Caitlin didn't you say you neeeded to talk to Hayley?
Yeah, Caitlin can I talk to you for a minute?
Let me get this straight, she invited you for dinner and you proceeded to include the rest of the student body?
Pretty crafty, huh?
What makes you think you can treat people like this?
We learned it from you. Remember our motto, "Act Superior, our number one rule?"
Don't you guys ever get tired of acting like snobs?
Alex, we're seniors. We're supposed to live it up, we have parties, we use little weaklings like Caitlin.
If you think it's acceptable to treat a kind and generous person like Caitlin, like that, we have no business being friends.
Well then who else are you going to hang out with for the rest of the year?
Who cares?
O.K. O.K. It's canceled.
We'll party at The Pointe instead.
Good, now apologize to Caitlin.
She's a sophomore, what do you expect from us?
Nothing, a decent gesture would be far too dignified for the three of you.
You know, you looked hideous in the newspaper.
See if we vote for you for queen?
Guys, we already did.

[Hayley in Alexia's body, watching Alexia in her body dancing on the cafeteria table, grabs Kyle]
Oh, Kyle you're such a good kisser. Give me another hickey, baby!
[starts to maul Kyle]

[as Hayley, who is trapped in Alex's body and sees herself dressed like a dominatrix]
You're not going to let her go to school like that, are you?
Well, now Alexia, I seem to recall seeing you in the same outfit a few months ago.
But it was Halloween!
[Alexia is in Hayley's body]
What next, Hayley? Are you gonna lose my virginity too?
You may have my body, breasts, and boyfriend, but you are not me.
Pop a Midol, who said anything about being late?!
[Alexia and Hayley are in each other's bodies, but their parents don't know it. Alexia is yelling at Hayley]
I've never seen Hayley express her feelings like that before!
[Hayley is in Alexia's body. Hayley looks at a picture of Alexia's boyfriend]
Today, you're mine.
Today is definitely day one.
Day one of what?
My diet. Oh, excuse me. I mean your diet. A fruit and veggie fast. You're bloated.
What are you talking about? I'm a knockout. Make-up may be a bit heavy. Not me.

[in Hayley's body]
So is there anything else I should know about you? Other than that you're a grungy, social outcast?

[in Alexia's body]
I'm not grungy. I just have my own style.
Oh, dirt under the fingernails is in? You won't mind if I remove it, will you?

[Hayley as Alexia]
Man oh, man. It worked.

[Alexia as Hayley]
What-what worked?
I uh...
You did this?
I made a wish when-when I saw a shooting star.
You made a wish to be me?
I didn't think it would work.
[touches her boobs]

[slaps her hand away from her chest]
Ewwwww! I don't like it in here!
[pushes Alexia against the bathroom door]
Wish us back!

[pushes her against the opposite wall]
I don't think that's possible, *Hayley*.
I think it is! *Hayley*! Do it now!
I can't!
[smugly]
It's daytime.
Well, I have a lot of personal things I have to deal with today, and we are not leaving this house until everything is back in order. I'll handle this.
[makes a dramatic exit]

[looks in the mirror]
Me? I'm Alexia. Alexia Wheaton.
[squeals and jumps up in excitement]
It's an abrasive product used to scrub away sink residue.
